Are you looking for a new survival RPG with roguelike progression?
Want to grow heroes, yet enjoy an intense RPG action with endless survival gameplay?

Play Wizard Hero! Our hero wizard game with powers and spells puts you on a simple mission: survive for as long as possible. Start by surviving 3 minutes, and see if you can survive for 30 minutes in one of the most intense RPG fight survival quests of 2022.

■ MAGIC SURVIVAL RPG
Take control of the Wizard Hero and fight against hordes of relentless enemies. You are in a midst of a growing invasion. Do you have the wizard skills to survive? Play to find out! Enjoy simple RPG controls with a big controller and play the action RPG game offline.

■ USE WIZARD SPELLS
Use your arsenal of spells to drop them down like a blob! Unlock different characters and build heroes.
Learn a new skill or improve one of the ones you have every time you level up. At each attempt, create unique hero spell combinations from thousands of possibilities.

■ UPGRADE HEROES
Grow your character as you play and get stronger after each attempt. Unlock hero characters with different abilities and tasks. Upgrade your heroes so you can survive even the longest and most dangerous waves. Buy Skill Damage, Cooldown Reduction, Damage Reduction, Luck, Max HP, and more!

■ DESTROY THE HORRIFIC WAVES OF ATTACKS
Destroy waves of unique wizard hero hunters including all kinds of monsters like blobs, vampires, orcs, skeletons, and more! Build super spell heroes that last longer in the infinite survival action quest against treacherous enemies.

■ COMPLETE QUESTS
Stay motivated and try to do your best with the Wizard Hero by completing the quests. Show talent and skills and try to complete all Wizard Hero quests.

WIZARD HERO – MAGIC SURVIVAL RPG
● 30+ unique hero wizard Spells
● 15+ unique enemies
● 30 waves of intense action
● Roguelike progression
● Unlock new characters
● Character growth system
● Complete quests
● Fantasy medieval soundtrack
● See total kills, survival time, the level reached, and gold gained after every loss.
● Play the wizard RPG offline

Do you think you have what it takes to become one of the survivors? Play and test your skills in this hero survival RPG fighting quest NOW!

Download and try Wizard Hero – the epic RPG survival quest!
